title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 3 categories on the x axis representing Brand, and Sales in million GBP in each Brand on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Male Lynx where Sales in million GBP is 98.0.
The lowest category is found at Female Dove where Sales in million GBP is 57.6.
The highest value at Male Lynx is almost 1.7 times larger than the minimum value of Female Dove.
The highest value at Male Lynx is almost 1.7 times larger than the minimum value of Female Dove.
The difference between the max Brand Male Lynx and min Brand Female Dove is 40.4.
